turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I was I was hoping to order two small pizzas today. Do you have any suggestions for maybe a good a local pizzeria shops?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me search around you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i see bella luna is in the area, would you like to try that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. It sounds good. I will try that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As I was saying, I was wanting two small pizzas. Can you tell me what kind of toppings they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they have all regular pizzeria toppings and specialty pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, what kind of special pizzas do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there most popular are meat lovers, veggie lovers, and supreme pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: get a meat lover and a veggie pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want one meat lovers and one veggie lovers, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. Could you make sure that both of them pizzas have a gluten-free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said thin crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, gluten-free. I don't want no gluten in my crust. Please make sure that it is gluten-free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, gluten free.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $28, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's okay. Could you repeat Repeat back to me my order to make sure it's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 2 small gluten free pizzas, 1 meat lovers and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that'll work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivery, I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that tip is not included in the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, your receipt will be texted to you and your delivery will be coming in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That we'll be it I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. Have a nice day.
